verses.kjv: And after these things I saw four angels standing on the four corners of the earth, holding the four winds of the earth, that the wind should not blow on the earth, nor on the sea, nor on any tree.
verses.web: After this, I saw four angels standing at the four corners of the earth, holding the four winds of the earth, so that no wind would blow on the earth, or on the sea, or on any tree.
verses.ct: After this, I saw 4 angels standing at the 4 corners of the earth, holding back the 4 winds so that no wind would blow on the land, the sea, or any tree.

verses.kjv: And I saw another angel ascending from the east, having the seal of the living God: and he cried with a loud voice to the four angels, to whom it was given to hurt the earth and the sea,
verses.web: I saw another angel ascend from the sunrise, having the seal of the living God. He cried with a loud voice to the four angels to whom it was given to harm the earth and the sea,
verses.ct: Then I saw another angel rising from the east, carrying the seal of the living God. He called out in a loud voice to the 4 angels who had been given power to damage the earth and the sea:

verses.kjv: Saying, Hurt not the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, till we have sealed the servants of our God in their foreheads.
verses.web: saying, “Don’t harm the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, until we have sealed the bondservants of our God on their foreheads!”
verses.ct: "Don't harm the land, the sea, or the trees until we have placed a seal on the foreheads of those who serve our God!"

verses.kjv: And I heard the number of them which were sealed: and there were sealed an hundred and forty and four thousand of all the tribes of the children of Israel.
verses.web: I heard the number of those who were sealed, one hundred forty-four thousand, sealed out of every tribe of the children of Israel:
verses.ct: I heard the number of those who were sealed: 144,000, drawn from every tribe of the children of Israel.

verses.kjv: Of the tribe of Juda were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Reuben were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Gad were sealed twelve thousand.
verses.web: of the tribe of Judah twelve thousand were sealed, of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand, of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Judah, 12,000 were sealed. From the tribe of Reuben, 12,000. From the tribe of Gad, 12,000.

verses.kjv: Of the tribe of Aser were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Nephthalim were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Manasses were sealed twelve thousand.
verses.web: of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand, of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand, of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Asher, 12,000. From the tribe of Naphtali, 12,000. From the tribe of Manasseh, 12,000.

verses.kjv: Of the tribe of Simeon were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Levi were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Issachar were sealed twelve thousand.
verses.web: of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand, of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand, of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand,
verses.ct: From the tribe of Simeon, 12,000. From the tribe of Levi, 12,000. From the tribe of Issachar, 12,000.

verses.kjv: Of the tribe of Zabulon were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Joseph were sealed twelve thousand. Of the tribe of Benjamin were sealed twelve thousand.
verses.web: of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousand, of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousand, and of the tribe of Benjamin twelve thousand were sealed.
verses.ct: From the tribe of Zebulun, 12,000. From the tribe of Joseph, 12,000. From the tribe of Benjamin, 12,000.

verses.kjv: After this I beheld, and, lo, a great multitude, which no man could number, of all nations, and kindreds, and people, and tongues, stood before the throne, and before the Lamb, clothed with white robes, and palms in their hands;
verses.web: After these things I looked, and behold, a great multitude, which no man could count, out of every nation and of all tribes, peoples, and languages, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, dressed in white robes, with palm branches in their hands.
verses.ct: After this, I looked and saw a massive crowd that no one could count — people from every nation, tribe, people, and language — standing before the throne and before the Lamb. They wore white robes and held palm branches in their hands.

verses.kjv: And cried with a loud voice, saying, Salvation to our God which sitteth upon the throne, and unto the Lamb.
verses.web: They cried with a loud voice, saying, “Salvation be to our God, who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb!”
verses.ct: They shouted in a loud voice, "Salvation belongs to our God, who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb!"

verses.kjv: And all the angels stood round about the throne, and about the elders and the four beasts, and fell before the throne on their faces, and worshipped God,
verses.web: All the angels were standing around the throne, the elders, and the four living creatures; and they fell on their faces before his throne, and worshiped God,
verses.ct: All the angels stood in a circle around the throne, the elders, and the 4 living creatures. They fell facedown before the throne and worshiped God,

verses.kjv: Saying, Amen: Blessing, and glory, and wisdom, and thanksgiving, and honour, and power, and might, be unto our God for ever and ever. Amen.
verses.web: saying, “Amen! Blessing, glory, wisdom, thanksgiving, honor, power, and might, be to our God forever and ever! Amen.”
verses.ct: saying, "Amen! Blessing and glory and wisdom and thanksgiving and honor and power and might belong to our God forever and ever! Amen."

verses.kjv: And one of the elders answered, saying unto me, What are these which are arrayed in white robes? and whence came they?
verses.web: One of the elders answered, saying to me, “These who are arrayed in the white robes, who are they, and where did they come from?”
verses.ct: Then one of the elders turned to me and asked, "These people dressed in white robes — who are they, and where did they come from?"

verses.kjv: And I said unto him, Sir, thou knowest. And he said to me, These are they which came out of great tribulation, and have washed their robes, and made them white in the blood of the Lamb.
verses.web: I told him, “My lord, you know.” He said to me, “These are those who came out of the great suffering.They washed their robes, and made them white in the Lamb’s blood.
verses.ct: I answered, "Sir, you know." He told me, "These are the ones who have come through the great tribulation. They washed their robes and made them white in the blood of the Lamb."

verses.kjv: Therefore are they before the throne of God, and serve him day and night in his temple: and he that sitteth on the throne shall dwell among them.
verses.web: Therefore they are before the throne of God, they serve him day and night in his temple. He who sits on the throne will spread his tabernacle over them.
verses.ct: "That is why they stand before God's throne, serving him day and night in his temple. The one who sits on the throne will shelter them with his presence.

verses.kjv: They shall hunger no more, neither thirst any more; neither shall the sun light on them, nor any heat.
verses.web: They will never be hungry or thirsty any more. The sun won’t beat on them, nor any heat;
verses.ct: They will never be hungry again, and they will never be thirsty again. The sun will not beat down on them, and no scorching heat will touch them.

verses.kjv: For the Lamb which is in the midst of the throne shall feed them, and shall lead them unto living fountains of waters: and God shall wipe away all tears from their eyes.
verses.web: for the Lamb who is in the middle of the throne shepherds them and leads them to springs of life-giving waters. And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes.”
verses.ct: For the Lamb at the center of the throne will be their shepherd. He will lead them to springs of living water, and God will wipe every tear from their eyes."
